properties.body:
GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
DNC 02.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 03-45N 006-43E AT 220505Z SEP.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS POSITION
   AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO NAVAREA II,
   PHONE: 332 9822 8888,
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 290505Z SEP 18.
